DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to collect long-term data on the inhibitor development rate of Human-cl rhFVIII in previously untreated patients with severe Hemophilia A.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate Immunogenicity, Efficacy and Safety of Treatment With Human-cl rhFVIII
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients who completed GENA05 in accordance with the study protocol 1. Severe liver or kidney disease 2. Concomitant treatment with any systemic immunosuppressive drug; 3. Other FVIII concentrate than Humancl rhFVIII was received between completion visit of GENA05 and start of GENA15 (except emergency cases).
